Posts.Content: Hopingforthebest33 wrote: my mom has been fighting stage four breast cancer for the past six years, her screen name was Justjudi. She talked on her many times through her battle, and I know it gave her comfort.I just thought I would let everyone know she is now at peace. Dx 8/5/2011, ILC, Left, 6cm+, Stage IIB, Grade 3, 0/26 nodes, ER-/PR-, HER2- Surgery 9/20/2011 Lymph node removal: Left, Sentinel, Underarm/Axillary; Mastectomy: Left; Prophylactic mastectomy: Right; Reconstruction (left): DIEP flap; Reconstruction (right): SIEA flap Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: My mom was my hero Hopingforthebest33 Leah_S
